{{Description|A quacking waterfowl. It lives around the rivers, lakes, and wetlands of Teyvat.<br />This duck with white feathers and a scarlet beak is quite common, as well as quite delicious...|in-game description from the [[Archive]]}}
'''Scarletbeak Duck''' is a type of Duck which can be found as a [[Wildlife]].

Ducks are usually found floating in ponds or lakes. When it senses or spots a player nearby, the duck will scatter by swimming rapidly away from the player. When a duck has been killed by the player, the nearby ducks will start to fly away. Killing it drops {{Item|Fowl|30|x=1}}.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Scarletbeak Duck can be found in the lake east of [[Mondstadt]] and in the river west of [[Windrise]]'s [[Statue of The Seven]].
